member.occupation: Data Scientist | Machine Learning | Deep Learning | Finance

projects.description: In this project, I served as the lead researcher and  principal investigator, aimed at the exploration into 3D print construction. My focus was on the intricate study of design principles,  material selection to ensure structural integrity and feasibility analysis. I developed machine learning techniques to optimize construction processes and enhance the precision of 3D printing technology. A significant aspect of my research also involved examining machine and human interaction, aiming to create a seamless interface that augments the capabilities of both.
projects.title: 3D Print Construction

member.occupation: Data Scientist | Machine Learning | Deep Learning | Finance

projects.description: Developing a system to process atomic force microscopy (AFM) cell images using Python and convolutional neural networks (CNN) to analyze the mechanical properties of cells. This project aims to automate the extraction and interpretation of cellular mechanical data, providing insights into cell structure and behavior for biomedical research.
projects.title: AFM Cell Image Processing for Mechanical Properties Analysis

member.occupation: Data Scientist | Machine Learning | Deep Learning | Finance

projects.description:
Lead AI Engineer and Principal Investigator 

Develop and refine a state-of-the-art prosthetic hand tailored for amputees, using AI integration. This project contains the detailed design and fabrication process utilizing 3D CAD modeling and precision 3D scanning techniques. Incorporating machine vision alongside image processing algorithms, the prosthetic hand aims to achieve functionality and adaptability. Deep learning methodologies are employed to ensure the prosthetic's intuitive and responsive control, mirroring natural hand movements.
projects.title: AI-assisted hand prosthetic

member.occupation: Data Scientist | Machine Learning | Deep Learning | Finance

projects.description:
Leadership Role

As a Business Analyst for Hamilton Ryker Company, I specialized in conducting comprehensive SWOT analysis to identify strategic opportunities and mitigate risks. My role involved performing financial analysis to assess the company's fiscal health and legal analysis to ensure compliance with relevant laws and regulations. I also carried out a cultural analysis to understand the impact of cultural factors on business operations. Central to my responsibilities was the integration of data analysis to inform decision-making processes, drawing actionable insights from complex datasets to drive business growth and efficiency.
projects.title: Business Analyst

member.occupation: Data Scientist | Machine Learning | Deep Learning | Finance

projects.description:
Lead Engineer 
Developing a comprehensive housing management system using SQL and Python to streamline interactions between property owners, renters, and real estate agents. The system will facilitate property listings, applications, payments, and requests, ensuring efficient and transparent management of housing resources.
projects.title: Housing Management System for Owners, Renters, and Agents

member.occupation: Data Scientist | Machine Learning | Deep Learning | Finance

projects.description:
Head of the team
Creating an advanced music artist detection system by utilizing the Spotify API, Python, deep learning, and convolutional neural networks (CNN). This project aims to accurately identify music artists, improve music recommendation systems, and provide personalized user experiences.
projects.title: Music Artist Detection Using Spotify API

member.occupation: Data Scientist | Machine Learning | Deep Learning | Finance

projects.description: Developing a natural language processing (NLP) chat assistant using pre-trained models and regular expressions (regex) to generate concise summaries and detailed descriptions of novels. This project aims to enhance the reading experience by providing users with quick overviews and in-depth insights into literary works.
projects.title: NLP Chat Assistant for Novel Summarization and Description in English and Spanish

member.occupation: Data Scientist | Machine Learning | Deep Learning | Finance

projects.description: As the Principal Investigator, my responsibilities are multifaceted. I lead the research and development efforts, collaborating with a team of experts to devise innovative solutions. Using Python programming, I design algorithms that analyze waste streams, identify valuable components, and optimize recovery processes. My role involves data-driven decision-making, modeling, and implementing efficient code to enhance resource utilization. I contribute to sustainable waste management practices, minimizing environmental impact and maximizing resource recovery.
projects.title: Waste Heat Recovery Optimization
